ValidationRule.description: If account is Inactive, Not Viable or Lost to Competitor, require notes in the Account Description Field.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISCHANGED(Prospect_Status__c), ISCHANGED(Active__c) ), OR( TEXT(Prospect_Status__c)= 'Not Viable', TEXT(Prospect_Status__c)= 'Lost to Competitor', Active__c = False ), ISBLANK( Description ), NOT(ISCHANGED(ISNetworld_Status__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter notes in the Account Description field on reason for marking this account as Inactive, Not Viable or Lost to Competitor
